Articles.Content:
Hi there. This is just one of these standard greeting threads so let's get cracking.

All so thanks squad for making su h a great game.

PS if I spell Things wrong, don't jump down my throat, I have dyslexia.

Hello, and welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear you're enjoying the game. We have some ongoing debates, but nobody usually jumps down your throat around here.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! SQUAD is definitely a great company. We're all glad to have you on the forums!
welcome to the forums and dont worry too much about spelling, few people will jump down your throat about it

welcome to the forums and dont worry too much about spelling, few people will jump down your throat about it

Heh...

Welcome to the forums!

*whistling* Not going to point it out...
